clauses.title: Definitions and Interpretation
clauses.text:
"OEM" shall mean the Original Equipment Manufacturer of the software or hardware product being supplied or resold by Softcell.
"EULA" shall mean the End User License Agreement issued by the respective OEM, governing the use of their proprietary software.

clauses.title: Scope of Work
clauses.text: To be added separately as part of Statement of Work.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.text:
All invoices shall be payable within thirty (30) days from the date of receipt. Disputes must be raised within seven (7) days of receipt.
Late payments attract a penalty of 2% per month.
In case of conflict, invoice terms shall prevail.
